name: @appnest/upgrade-browser
description: A simple customizable HTML file to show users that should upgrade their browser

scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch && git stash && npm version patch && git stash apply && git add . && git commit --no-edit --amend --no-verify
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor && git stash && npm version minor && git stash apply && git add . && git commit --no-edit --amend --no-verify
scripts.bump:major: npm version major && git stash && npm version major && git stash apply && git add . && git commit --no-edit --amend --no-verify
scripts.publish:patch: npm run bump:patch && git push && npm run b:lib && npm run publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run bump:minor && git push && npm run b:lib && npm run publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run bump:major && git push && npm run b:lib && npm run publish
